metadata.title: CVE-2020-9549 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
In PDFResurrect 0.12 through 0.19, get_type in pdf.c has an out-of-boundswrite via a crafted PDF document.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-9549` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

pdfresurrect - 0.12-6ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pdfresurrect package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.12-6ubuntu0.2').
